name: VRtender
description: VRtender is a virtual reality bartending game set in your very own dive bar. You'll make cocktails, pour beers, entertain your patrons, and much more as you take up all the responsibilities of a bartender... without the mess.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
